🚀 Instant Google Index Checker - Stay Ahead of the Competition! 🚀

Do you want to know if your website is indexed on Google? Are you an SEO expert, content creator, or website owner looking to optimize your online presence? Look no further! The Google Index Checker extension is your new go-to tool for checking if URLs are indexed on Google with just a click! ⚡

🌟 Why Install Google Index Checker?
Imagine you’ve just published a new article or webpage, but you’re not sure if it’s visible on Google yet. This extension solves that problem instantly! It helps you save time and effort by checking if your page (or multiple pages) is indexed in Google Search. No more guessing or waiting around – know the status right now! 💡

🛠️ Features:

Automatic Check for the Current Page 🔍
The moment you click on the extension, it automatically checks if the page you’re on is indexed by Google and shows you the result in seconds.
No need to press any extra buttons! It's fast, efficient, and super easy. ⏱️
Bulk URL Checking for Up to 10 URLs 📋

Have multiple pages or posts to check? Paste up to 10 URLs, hit the Bulk Check button, and the extension will run through all of them to show whether each URL is indexed or not.
Results are displayed in a clean, scrollable table for easy navigation. 📜
URL Validation to Save API Quota 🛡️

We care about efficiency! The extension validates each URL before making requests to ensure your Google API quota is not wasted on invalid or broken URLs. Only valid URLs get checked for indexing, helping you save resources.
Color-Coded Results for Clarity 🎨

Get instant visual feedback with our color-coded results system. URLs that are indexed will show in green ✅, while non-indexed URLs will show in red ❌. For invalid URLs or errors, the results appear in orange ⚠️, making it super easy to understand the status at a glance.

Scroll-Enabled Bulk Checker for Seamless Browsing ⏩
The bulk checker is scrollable, allowing you to smoothly navigate through large lists of URLs without clutter. Manage your data more effectively and track multiple pages with ease!

Responsive and Clean User Interface 🌟
The extension is designed with user-friendliness in mind. It features a fixed-size popup window with a clean, attractive layout, offering an effortless experience even for beginners. 🖼️

Completely Private & Secure 🔐
Your data is safe with us! The URLs you check stay local to your browser. We don’t track or store any information about your websites or URLs.
🏆 Who Is This Extension For?
SEO Experts 📈: Optimize your site rankings by checking if your SEO efforts are being indexed properly.
Bloggers ✍️: Quickly check if your blog posts are appearing on Google.
Web Developers 💻: Ensure that new pages or changes are reflected in Google’s index.
Marketers & Content Creators 📊: Confirm that marketing materials, landing pages, or campaign links are visible to your audience.

🤔 How Does It Work?
One-Click Check: As soon as you open the extension, the current page's URL is checked and results are shown automatically.
Bulk URL Checker: Paste up to 10 URLs in the provided text area and click the "Bulk Check" button to get the indexing status for all your links. Results are displayed in a neat table for easy reference.

💡 Why Is Indexing Important?
Google indexing is critical for your online visibility. If your website or pages are not indexed, they won’t appear in search results, limiting your reach and traffic. By regularly checking your indexed status, you can ensure that your SEO and content strategies are on track, making this tool essential for anyone focused on boosting their digital footprint! 🌍

📦 Lightweight and Fast
We’ve kept this extension small in size but big in functionality. It’s built to be lightning-fast ⚡ and won’t slow down your browser. Its sleek design and efficient code make sure it runs smoothly, even when checking multiple URLs.

💡 Super Easy to Use
No need to be tech-savvy! Just install the extension, click the icon in your browser, and the extension will do the rest. You can immediately see if your current page is indexed, or check multiple URLs with minimal effort.

🌐 Multi-Purpose Tool for All Website Owners
Whether you run a small blog or manage a large portfolio of websites, the Google Index Checker will streamline your workflow. You’ll save time by avoiding manual checks and instead get the indexing results delivered instantly right in your browser. 🔗

💬 What Users Are Saying:
"A must-have for any SEO professional! It saves me hours every week!" ⭐⭐⭐⭐⭐
"Super simple and does exactly what it promises. Love the bulk check feature!" ⭐⭐⭐⭐⭐
"Great for checking if my pages are visible to Google without having to open the Search Console!" ⭐⭐⭐⭐⭐

⚙️ How to Get Started:
Click the Add to Chrome button above.
Once installed, click the extension icon next to your address bar.
The extension will automatically check the current page’s Google index status.
For bulk checking, paste up to 10 URLs, and hit Bulk Check to see which are indexed!

💬 Support & Feedback
We love hearing from our users! If you have any questions, issues, or feature requests, feel free to reach out to us. Your feedback helps us make this extension even better! 🙌
